label: Management Seminar
description: Addresses production and management issues surrounding Theater Department and KCPA productions. Guest speakers provide professional points of view on various management topics. 1 undergraduate hour. 1 graduate hour. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 6 undergraduate or 6 graduate hours.
courseSectionInformation: 1 undergraduate hour. 1 graduate hour. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 6 undergraduate or 6 graduate hours.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to BFA:Theatre:Stage Mngmnt -UIUC or MFA:Theatre (MFA-Design) -UIUC.
